text:
WOW. Fraud on top of fraud with #chloroquine. "Trial" compared mildly sick COVID patients given the drug to hospitalized patients in the "control" group. 

Deliberate deception to the public, and to patients who were billed for hospitalizations that didn't exist. https://t.co/ivNvUxWdRN https://t.co/CxgLzYS9m5
